description: Soleil`s Eevee evolved into Soleil`s Espeon one day when she was young and tripped on a rock during the middle of the day. It sensed that Chloe`s Eevee would fall off a cliff and it rescued it. During the group battle at the Eclipse Castle balcony, it helped defeat Ilunas`s Pok√©mon.
name: Eifie (Haruhi)
